projects.name: Podcast Gen
projects.description: Text-to-speech and audio-to-text transcriber monorepo. Powered by AWS, Gemini AI, and React. Currently optimizing features for public release.

projects.name: Tip Tally Pro
projects.description: Designed to streamline the management of tips and cash distribution for hospitality closing staff. This application provides a user-friendly interface for calculating and distrubting tips among employees, as well as managing cash registers. Built using React, React Router, and styled-components, the application ensures a seamless and responsive user experience.

projects.name: Stoned Cold Dreamery
projects.description: Frontend concept for an ice-cream webstore, showcasing product listings, interactive features, and user authentication via Firebase.

projects.description: A dynamic large part event booking platform with customizable venue management and bar rental packages.

projects.name: Esperi
projects.description: A tarot card app that deals three random cards and provides personalized readings using OpenAI. Integrates React, OpenAI, and p5.js for interactive readings.

responsibilities: Participated in on-call rotation for real-time system reliability.
Implemented monitors using Terraform, Sentry, and Datadog to track file upload errors, reducing resolution time by 20%.
Designed and developed the Search & Match modal feature, increasing event association accuracy by 98%.
Provided critical SRE support during high-demand events onsale events such as Taylor Swift's Eras tour.
Lead project demo meetings to stakeholders.
